message.content:
{"id": "112458", "title": "Bug 112458 - Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch to Master page viewer.", 
"description": "Bug 112458 - Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switch to Master page viewer.

Description:
When switching to the Master page viewer, the Property Editor should only display the properties of the Master page. However, it still shows the properties of layout items.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Switch to Master Page viewer.

OB: 

EB: When switching to the Master page viewer, the Property Editor should only display the properties of the Master page, not the properties of layout items.

SR: The Property Editor should be updated to accurately reflect the properties of the currently selected viewer."}
